meanings.definition: A person who is very active or works energetically.
meanings.sent1: The playground bustler ran around with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The office bustler always finishes tasks quickly.
meanings.sent3: The little bustler tried to carry all the toys at once.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, he stood out as a true bustler.
meanings.sent5: The energetic bustler never seemed to tire.

meanings.definition: To move or act with a great show of energy.
meanings.sent1: She would bustler through the obstacle course with determination.
meanings.sent2: The dancers bustler across the stage in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent3: The chef would bustler around the kitchen, creating a delicious mess.
meanings.sent4: The wind bustler through the trees, rustling the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The athletes bustler towards the finish line, giving their all.
